snippet: In open wheel or a stock car, Juan Pablo Montoya knows how to top the speed chart at Pocono Raceway....

headline.print_headline: Montoya Wins 1st IndyCar Pole at Pocono Raceway
headline.main: Montoya Wins 1st IndyCar Pole at Pocono Raceway

lead_paragraph: In open wheel or a stock car, Juan Pablo Montoya knows how to top the speed chart at Pocono Raceway.
